author: Naresh raju-2015-10-09T07:24:15-0400
title: Budget Hotels in Goa
text:
| October 9, 2015 
‘Beach Capital of India”. 
‘Beach Capital of India”. It is one of the most happening holiday destination of India and it attracts travelers from around the world. Goa is the perfect holiday destination. It is a tourist hub. Tourism is the main industry in Goa. Goa provides good and comfortable accommodations for the travelers. Goa is known for its friendly culture, with influences of Portuguese colonialism, Roman Catholicism, Hinduism and Islam. Goa is known for its exotic beaches and swaying palm trees around the world. 
Churches, forts, palaces, temples, wildlife sanctuaries etc are main and best attractions of tourism of Goa where you can visit and enjoy your stay in the hotels with a memorable and unique holiday experience. If you are in a plan to spend your holiday in Goa , then book a hotel or a beach resort according your need and budget .
